name: Eviction Cases
definition: The total number of Unlawful Detainer cases filed in court by landlords between 2018 and 2023. Source: Legal Services Corporation Virginia

name: Eviction Case Rate
definition: The number of Unlawful Detainer cases filed per renting household between 2018 and 2023. Source: Legal Services Corporation Virginia

name: Eviction Cases by Business
definition: The number of Unlawful Detainer cases filed by business entities between 2018 and 2023. Source: Legal Services Corporation Virginia

name: Eviction Cases by Business per Cases
definition: The percentage of Unlawful Detainer cases filed by business entities between 2018 and 2023.

name: Median Eviction Amount
definition: The median dollar amount owed to the landlord by the tenant per Unlawful Detainer case between 2018 and 2023. Source: Legal Services Corporation Virginia

name: Eviction Judgments
definition: The number of Unlawful Detainer cases filed where a Judgment for Possession was ruled between 2018 and 2023. Source: Legal Services Corporation Virginia

name: Eviction Judgment Rate
definition: The number of Judgments for Possession per rental household between 2018 and 2023. Source: Legal Services Corporation Virginia

name: Eviction Judgments per Cases
definition: The percentage of Unlawful Detainer cases where a Judgment for Possession was ruled between 2018 and 2023.

name: Households
definition: The total number of housing units between 2018 and 2022. A housing unit is a house, an apartment, a mobile home, a group of rooms, a single room occupied as a separate living quarter or vacant units intended for occupancy. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Renting Households
definition: The number of renter-occupied housing units between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Percent Renting Households
definition: The percentage of housing units that were renter-occupied between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Median Rent
definition: The median gross monthly rental amount per unit between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Median Household Income
definition: The median total pretax cash income of everyone 15 or older living in the same housing unit. This includes income from wages, salaries, investments, businesses, and government entitlements like unemployment, social security, and child support. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Cost-Burdened Renters
definition: The number of renters who pay more than 30% of their income for housing between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Percent Cost-Burdened Renters
definition: The percent of renters who pay more than 30% of their income for housing between 2018 and 2022.

name: Percent White
definition: The percent of the population who identify as white alone between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Percent Black
definition: The percent of the population who identify as Black or African American alone between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Percent American Indian and Alaska Native
definition: The percent of the population who identify as American Indian or Alaska Native alone between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Percent Asian
definition: The percent of the population who identify as Asian alone between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Percent Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander
definition: The percent of the population who identify as Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander alone between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Percent Some other race alone
definition: The percent of the population who identify as a race not listed above alone between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Percent Two or More Races
definition: The percent of the population who identify as 2 or more races between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022

name: Percent Hispanic or Latino
definition: The percent of the population who identify as Hispanic or Latino between 2018 and 2022. Source: American Community Survey 5-Year Estimates 2022
